page.title: 15ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Trelowarren Craft Centre is the base for the Cornwall Crafts Assoc.This association is a thriving one and holds regular exhibitions.First of all we went to see the potter and asked him some questions We asked him how many pots he made in a day.He told us 300 and he gets 20,000 visiters a year.The biggest pots cost Â£40 or Â£50. To make a pot it takes about 5 mins.and 10-14 hrs.to fire .He also told us about the weaver because she wasn't there.He told us about the shuttle which she weaves with.She makes rugs and bookmarks.The most expensive rugs cost Â£120.The design takes about 2-5 hours and a lot of people visit her.In the future we hope that the Crafts assoc. will continue to grow. Only time will tell.
